package.name: ldid (CoolStar Standalone Fork)
package.shortDescription: fork of ldid for CoolStar's tweaks (deployed to device because AGPL requires it).

descriptionlist.description: ldid (CoolStar Standalone Fork) 2.1.2, compatible to iOS 7.0 - iOS 13.4.5

You can also have
a multi-line item.
